divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my roommate saw an unusually bright dot low on the horizon and took a couple photos of it. After about an hour when we looked again it was not there. We were home, hanging out on our terrace.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Rome
There were no other sightings in Rome on or around July 7th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: extremely bright fixed light low on the horizon...disappeared after about an hour
